definitions.definition: Exercises assigned by a teacher to a student which review concepts studied in class .
examples: You must do your homework before you can watch television.

subdefinitions.definition: Something which one is encouraged to learn or study on one's own.
examples: The speaker had certainly done his homework before delivering the lecture.

definitions.definition: Any work that is done at home ; housework .
Tasks assigned by a dominant for a submissive to perform when they are physically away from their dominant or otherwise free.

main_definition: Exercises assigned by a teacher to a student which review concepts studied in class .
secondary_definitions: ( literally , now rare ) Any work that is done at home ; housework .
( BDSM ) Tasks assigned by a dominant for a submissive to perform when they are physically away from their dominant or otherwise free.
